channel.title: Privacy on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Auditing Privacy Mechanisms via Label Inference Attacks
item.description: New metrics audit label privatization, revealing differentially private schemes often outperform heuristic methods in the privacy-utility tradeoff.

item.title: Langevin Unlearning: A New Perspective of Noisy Gradient Descent for Machine Unlearning
item.description: Langevin unlearning offers a novel, privacy-preserving machine unlearning framework based on noisy gradient descent, handling both convex and non-convex problems efficiently.

item.title: Private Edge Density Estimation for Random Graphs: Optimal, Efficient and Robust
item.description: This paper delivers a groundbreaking polynomial-time algorithm for optimally estimating edge density in random graphs while ensuring node privacy and robustness against data corruption.
